title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Gather and analyze the functional and non-functional requirements for the KI-LiteraturAssistant. Identify user needs, constraints, and prioritize features based on their impact on the user experience and system performance. This task includes creating a comprehensive requirements document that serves as a foundation for the project's development. Additionally, suggest potential areas of improvement or additional features that could enhance the product, based on current trends in AI literature assistance tools.

title: Design KI-LiteraturAssistent Architecture
description: Develop a high-level architecture for the KI-LiteraturAssistent, including system components, integration points, and data flows.

title: Develop User Interface Design
description: Design an intuitive user interface for the KI-LiteraturAssistent that caters to authors' needs.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Develop the backend services required to support the KI-LiteraturAssistent, including text processing, translation, and analysis capabilities.

title: Integrate External APIs and Services
description: Identify and integrate necessary external APIs and services, such as translation services and text analysis tools.

title: Create and Train Machine Learning Models
description: Develop and train machine learning models for text processing, translation, and analysis capabilities.

title: Perform Unit and Integration Testing
description: Test individual components of the KI-LiteraturAssistent as well as their integration with each other.

title: Deploy KI-LiteraturAssistent to Production Environment
description: Deploy the KI-LiteraturAssistent to a production environment and ensure it is properly configured, scalable, and secure.

title: Document KI-LiteraturAssistent Functionality
description: Create user documentation for the KI-LiteraturAssistant, detailing its features and usage.
